languages.text: Абеляр Версериан оставался сенешалем и правой рукой Лорд-капитана до последнего дня. Род Версериан, избавленный от обвинений в мятеже, посвятил себя флоту Даргонуса. Когда годы спустя досточтимый Абеляр погиб, лучший из лучших отпрысков его семейства удостоился чести унаследовать высокий пост сенешаля.

Abelard Werserian remained the Lord Captain's Seneschal and right hand until his dying breath. House Werserian, cleared of accusations of mutiny, dedicated itself to Dargonus's fleet. When, years later, Abelard left this world, the worthiest successor of his family received the honour of inheriting the high office of Seneschal.
languages.original_text: Абеляр Версериан оставался сенешалем и правой рукой Лорд-капитана до последнего дня. Род Версериан, избавленный от обвинений в мятеже, посвятил себя флоту Даргонуса. Когда годы спустя досточтимый Абеляр погиб, лучший из лучших отпрысков его семейства удостоился чести унаследовать высокий пост сенешаля.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian was kept being a Seneschal and a right hand to the Lord Captain until his last breath. Werserian house, cleared of accusations of mutiny, dedicated itself to the Dargonus fleet. When several decades later fell stricken by the hand of enemies of the dynasty, the best of the best of children of his family received the honour to inherit the high position of Seneschal.

Abelard Werserian was kept being a Seneschal and a right hand to the Lord Captain until his last breath. Werserian house, cleared of accusations of mutiny, dedicated itself to the Dargonus fleet. When several decades later fell stricken by the hand of enemies of the dynasty, the best of the best of children of his family received the honour to inherit the high position of Seneschal.

Abelard Werserian remained the Seneschal and the right hand of the Lord Captain until his dying breath. House Werserian, cleared of accusations of mutiny, dedicated itself to Dargonus's fleet. When, several decades later, Abelard fell on a remote planet at the hands of enemies of the dynasty, the worthiest successor of his family received the honour of inheriting the high office of the Seneschal.

Abelard Werserian remained the Seneschal and the right hand of the Lord Captain until his dying breath. House Werserian, cleared of accusations of mutiny, dedicated itself to Dargonus's fleet. When, several decades later, Abelard fell on a remote planet at the hands of enemies of the dynasty, the worthiest successor of his family received the honour of inheriting the high office of the Seneschal.

Abelard Werserian remained the Lord Captain's Seneschal and right hand until his dying breath. House Werserian, cleared of accusations of mutiny, dedicated itself to Dargonus's fleet. When, years later, Abelard left this world, the worthiest successor of his family received the honour of inheriting the high office of Seneschal.

Abelard Werserian remained the Lord Captain's Seneschal and right hand until his dying breath. House Werserian, cleared of accusations of mutiny, dedicated itself to Dargonus's fleet. When, years later, Abelard left this world, the worthiest successor of his family received the honour of inheriting the high office of Seneschal.

languages.text: 阿贝拉德·韦尔森继续担任领主舰长的总领与得力助手，直到生命结束为止。韦尔森家族洗脱了叛变的指控，投身于达戈努斯的舰队。许多年之后，阿贝拉德离世，而韦尔森家族最出色的继承人有幸继任了总领之职。
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian remained the Lord Captain's Seneschal and right hand until his dying breath. House Werserian, cleared of accusations of mutiny, dedicated itself to Dargonus's fleet. When, years later, Abelard left this world, the worthiest successor of his family received the honour of inheriting the high office of Seneschal.

traits.locale_text: 阿贝拉德·韦尔森继续担任领主舰长的总领与得力助手，直到生命结束为止。韦尔森家族洗脱了叛变的指控，投身于达戈努斯的舰队。几十年后，阿贝拉德在某颗遥远的行星上命丧王朝敌人之手，而韦尔森家族最出色的继承人有幸继任了总领之职。

languages.text: Abelard Werserian blieb bis zu seinem letzten Atemzug Truchsess und rechte Hand des Lord Captain. Das Haus Werserian, vom Vorwurf der Meuterei freigesprochen, widmete sich der Flotte von Dargonus. Als Abelard einige Jahrzehnte später auf dieses Leben verließ, erhielt der würdigste Nachfolger aus seiner Familie die Ehre, das hohe Amt des Truchsesses zu erben.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian remained the Lord Captain's Seneschal and right hand until his dying breath. House Werserian, cleared of accusations of mutiny, dedicated itself to Dargonus's fleet. When, years later, Abelard left this world, the worthiest successor of his family received the honour of inheriting the high office of Seneschal.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian blieb bis zu seinem letzten Atemzug der Truchsess und die rechte Hand des Lord Captain. Das Haus Werserian, vom Vorwurf der Meuterei freigesprochen, widmete sich der Flotte von Dargonus. Als Abelard einige Jahrzehnte später auf einem fernen Planeten durch Feinde der Dynastie fiel, erhielt der würdigste Nachfolger aus seiner Familie die Ehre, das hohe Amt des Truchsesses zu erben.

languages.text: Abélard Werserian resta le bras droit et le sénéchal {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} jusqu'à son dernier souffle. Quant à la maison Werserian, lavée des accusations de mutinerie, elle prit fait et cause pour la flotte de Dargonus. Lorsque Abélard trouva la mort des années plus tard, le plus digne représentant de sa famille eut l'honneur d'hériter de la haute charge de sénéchal.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian remained the Lord Captain's Seneschal and right hand until his dying breath. House Werserian, cleared of accusations of mutiny, dedicated itself to Dargonus's fleet. When, years later, Abelard left this world, the worthiest successor of his family received the honour of inheriting the high office of Seneschal.

traits.locale_text: Abélard Werserian resta le bras droit et le sénéchal {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} jusqu'à son dernier souffle. Quant à la maison Werserian, lavée des accusations de mutinerie, elle prit fait et cause pour la flotte de Dargonus. Lorsqu’Abélard succomba plusieurs décennies plus tard en combattant les ennemis de la dynastie sur une lointaine planète, le plus digne représentant de sa famille eut l'honneur d'hériter de la haute charge de sénéchal.

languages.text: Abelard Werserian siguió siendo el Senescal y mano derecha de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán hasta el día de su muerte. La casa Werserian, declarada inocente de las acusaciones de amotinamiento, se dedicó por entero a la flota de Dargonus. Años más tarde, cuando Abelard falleció, su descendiente mejor capacitado tuvo el honor de heredar el elevado puesto de Senescal.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian remained the Lord Captain's Seneschal and right hand until his dying breath. House Werserian, cleared of accusations of mutiny, dedicated itself to Dargonus's fleet. When, years later, Abelard left this world, the worthiest successor of his family received the honour of inheriting the high office of Seneschal.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian siguió siendo el Senescal y mano derecha de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán hasta el día de su muerte. La casa Werserian, declarada inocente de las acusaciones de amotinamiento, se dedicó por entero a la flota de Dargonus. Décadas más tarde, cuando Abelard cayó en un planeta remoto a manos de los enemigos de la dinastía, su descendiente mejor capacitado tuvo el honor de heredar el elevado puesto del Senescal.

languages.text: アベラルド・ウェルザリアンは最期の瞬間までロード・キャプテンの家令長、そして右腕であり続けた。反逆の疑いを晴らしたウェルザリアン家は、ダルゴナスの艦隊にすべてを捧げた。それから数年後、アベラルドがこの世を去った時、一族の中で最もその座に相応しい後継者が、家令長という高位を継承するという栄誉を受けた。
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian remained the Lord Captain's Seneschal and right hand until his dying breath. House Werserian, cleared of accusations of mutiny, dedicated itself to Dargonus's fleet. When, years later, Abelard left this world, the worthiest successor of his family received the honour of inheriting the high office of Seneschal.

traits.locale_text: アベラルド・ウェルザリアンは最期の瞬間までロード・キャプテンの家令長、そして右腕であり続けた。反逆の疑いを晴らしたウェルザリアン家は、ダルゴナスの艦隊にすべてを捧げた。それから数年後、アベラルドがこの世を去った時、一族の中で最もその座に相応しい後継者が、家令長という高位を継承するという栄誉を受けた。

languages.text: Abelard Werserian, son nefesini verene dek Lord Kaptan'ın Seneşal'i ve sağ kolu olarak kaldı. İsyankârlık suçlamalarından aklanan Werserian Hanesi, kendisini Dargonus filosuna adadı. Abelard yıllar sonra bu dünyadan göç ettiğinde ailesindeki en saygın vâris, Seneşallik titrini miras olarak alma onuruna erişti.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian remained the Lord Captain's Seneschal and right hand until his dying breath. House Werserian, cleared of accusations of mutiny, dedicated itself to Dargonus's fleet. When, years later, Abelard left this world, the worthiest successor of his family received the honour of inheriting the high office of Seneschal.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian son nefesini verene kadar Lord Kaptan'ın Seneşal'i ve sağ kolu olarak kaldı. Werserian Hanesi isyankârlık suçlamalarından aklandı ve kendisini Dargonus filosuna adadı. Abelard yıllar sonra bu dünyadan göç ettiğinde, ailesinden gelen en saygın vâris, Seneşallik titrini miras olarak alma onuruna erişti.
